title: So i was DC from a game and was put in Low Priority
body: So i join a ranked game early and champ select went well but i loading screen I was disconnected from the servers. I tried to log in but a pop up saying my net could not connect and or my firewall was blocking it, i quickly checked my firewall settings and net but they seemed fine. I even changed it to see if it might work out but yet nothing. An hour later I was able to connect but i was put in low priority just because i was disconnected and wasn't able to log in. What happen!?

replies.body: Leavebuster got you. You would have had to disconnect from multiple games for this to happen.
U obviously have left/ dced other games recently. Fix yo shiz boi
